fields.name: Intuition Mediation Spell
fields.chant: I dedicate this moment to the powers of pure white light and allow the stream of universal energy to course through me unhindered by trivial and harmful thoughts. This quiet moment connects me to the core of creative energy.
fields.location: in a comfortable chair by the light of a candle
fields.instructions:
Sit quietly.
 Close your eyes and take three deep breaths in through the nose and out through the mouth before silently reading the chant.
 Take ten deep breaths counting from ten to one after reading the chant.

fields.name: Self Love Manifestation
fields.chant: I am a magnet for love, love is within me, without me, before me, and behind me. I AM LOVE.
fields.when_most_powerful: when done daily for one week starting and ending on a Friday
fields.location: on the ground by the light of a red candle
fields.instructions:
Sit or lay quietly.
 Hold the rose quartz over your heart.
 Close your eyes and take a deep breath in through the nose and out through the mouth before and after reading the chant.
fields.additional_info: Perform this spell before any love related spells to increase power.

fields.name: Love Powder
fields.instructions:
Mix all ingredients together in a ceramic bowl with a fork.
 As you mix visualize a warm pink light building and radiating out from the powder.
 Put the powder into a jar to take to sprinkle on the belongings of the person you desire, sprinkle powder on yourself after bathing and sprinkle powder in your underwear drawer.
 Then take the rest of the powder in the palm of your hand and, in a sunny spot outside, blow a little north, a little south, a little east and a little west.
fields.additional_info: This powder can also be used in a little charm to give to a friend or lover to keep them thinking about you.

fields.name: Charm to Discourage Unwanted Attention
fields.chant: Go from me hence and find thee another.
fields.location: having access to a stream or canal
fields.instructions:
Take the photograph of the person whose advances you wish to discourage and smear it with oil, wrap it in the dark cloth and set it aside.
 In a pan, dry roast the spices (don't burn them!).
 Pour the mixture into a container. Position the photograph on the floor, remove the cloth and place the candle next to the photograph.
 Use the spice mixture to draw a circle around the photograph, light the candle and recite the chant.
 Let the candle burn out before any next steps.
 Toss the photo into a stream or canal and toss the sugar cubes in shortly after.

fields.name: Prosperity Oil
fields.location: away from sun rays, a cool, dark location
fields.instructions:
Mix all the ingredients into a bottle.
 Let the oil mixture sit in a cool dark place for three weeks.
 After three weeks, add a small coin to the bottle.
 Drop a tiny drop of oil on financial documents or currency to draw wealth.
 A small piece of green cloth anointed with the oil and stored in your purse or wallet, or the oil used as perfume, will also draw wealth.
fields.additional_info:
If desired, to get rid of basil powder residue, strain with muslin or cheesecloth.
 Use as little cinnamon oil as possible if desired outcome is to wear the oil as a perfume.
 Store oil in dark area away from sun rays

fields.name: Aromatherapy Love Philter
fields.location: room where two lovers are to meet
fields.instructions:
To an oil burner full of water add the ingredients.
 Place the red candles in a circle, light them, and anoint each candle with the mixture while reciting the chant.
 After the final recitation, blow out the candles to ground the magic.

fields.name: Four Winds Wishing Spell
fields.chant: King Boreas of the North Wind, by the powers of earth, I call you to carry my wish to the Northern quarter, and by the powers of the gnomes, I ask that you bring me success. King Eureus of the East Wind, by the powers of air, I call you to carry my wish to the Eastern quarter, and by the powers of the sylphs, I ask that you bring me success. King Notus of the South Wind, by the powers of fire, I call you to carry my wish to the Southern quarter, and by the powers of the salamanders, I ask that you bring me success. King Zephyrus of the West Wind, by the powers of water, I call you to carry my wish to the Western quarter, and by the powers of the undines, I ask that you bring me success.
fields.instructions:
Mix the herbs depending on what type of wish you want granted.
 Hold the herb mixture in your hands and visualize the achievement of your goal in fine detail.
 Hold the herbs to your mouth and breathe upon them trying to force the wish through your breath into the herbs.
 When you are satisfied turn North and recite the part of the chant targeted towards the King of the North Wind blow a quarter of the herbs into the direction of the North.
 Do the same with the Kings of the East, South, and West Winds as well.
 Once the spell has ended, leave the area without looking back, safe in the knowledge that the powers of the universe have taken over your wish.
fields.additional_info:
Herbs and The Wishes They Grant:
 Bay leaf (success and prestige wishes)
 Rosemary (promotion and advancement wishes)
 Cinnamon (power wishes)
 Vervain (general wishes)
 Cardamom (love wishes)
 Peppermint (prosperity wishes)

fields.name: Mexican Protection Charm Bag
fields.chant: Sanctified Santa Marta, bless and cleanse me of my woes. Slay the dragon of my misfortune and light my way upon the path to peace and tranquility. Bless my charm and occasion it to protect me against all harm in your name.
fields.instructions:
Take the red cloth and fold it to create a pouch, each herb and the crystal inside the pouch and sew the edges closed to ensure that the contents do not fall out.
 Kiss the pouch and place it beneath your pillow to sleep on for four consecutive nights.
 After the fourth night, hold the charm bag in your hands and with closed eyes and visualize a red energy emanating from the pouch growing stronger and radiating out to fill the room.
 Light the candle and recite the chant.
fields.additional_info: Keep the charm on your person at all times.

fields.name: Charm to Secure Employment
fields.instructions:
Take the green cloth and lay it flat with one of the corners pointing to you.
 Place the ingredients in the center.
 Tie the corners of the cloth together with the string to create a little bundle of herbs.
 Before each interview hold the bundle to your forehead and visualize yourself radiating confidence and captivating the interviewers.
 Bring the charm to all interviews.
fields.additional_info: Any rejection is a sign from the universe the job was not right for you.

fields.name: World Travel Safety Spell
fields.chant: Little King Mercury, swift and alert, be on guard here and watch ever vigilantly for me [or name of traveler]. Bless this amulet made in your name and let it be a stout and true guard against all malady, hurt, fear, trial and tribulation.
fields.when_most_powerful: on a Wednesday, early in the morning at dawn
fields.instructions:
Place the items neatly before you.
 Coil the copper wire around the candle from base to tip, creating a spiral design.
 Light both the candle and incense.
 Holding the chain and bead in hand, recite the chant.
 Breathe upon the amulet (the bead and chain) seventeen times with your eyes closed and feel the energy.
 Attempt to push the energy into the amulet.
 When finished, anointed the amulet with lemongrass oil before wearing.
fields.additional_info: This spell can be preformed by the self for the self or on behalf of a loved one about to take a trip.

fields.name: Magical Water to Bring Peace
fields.chant: Powers of the sea, powers of the rain, powers of the stream and field be ye to the right of me and to te left of me. Be ye before and aft and all about. Flood thy peace into this liquid of the art and bring harmony, blessed concord and tranquility to my bone. So mote it be.
fields.location: in your home, by the light of a blue candle
fields.instructions:
Gently stir the ingredients and piece of mirror in a glass bottle (be careful of the mirror when stirring).
 Light a blue candle and say the chant over the mixture.
 Once finished, add a single white rose to the bottle.
 Walk about the home sprinkling the mixture in every room.
 Place a little of the mixture into a small saucer and place that under the beds of particularly restless residents to calm and pacify the home.
fields.additional_info: Alcohol is a necessary step, as it keeps the mixture from turning sour.
